mapper.select: select r1.name as category, r2.* from category r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.idx = r2.category where r1.idx = #{idx} order by r2.score fetch first 10 rows only
select r1.name as category, r2.* from category r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.idx = r2.category where r1.idx = #{idx} order by r2.score fetch first 5 rows only
select r1.name as category, r2.* from category r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.idx = r2.category order by r2.score fetch first 10 rows only
select r1.name as category, r2.* from category r1 inner join restaurant r2 on r1.idx = r2.category where r2.address like #{area} order by r2.score fetch first 10 rows only
